content.html: New: The Uvalde gunman had threatened to rape, kill and kidnap girls in online messages before the attack. But teens who reported it were ignored, and some saw his angry misogyny as just “how online is" washingtonpost.com/technology/202… @SilviaElenaFF @Cat_Zakrzewski @NaomiNixWrites
